GoolagScanner::HttpSimpleGet

GoolagScanner::HttpSimpleGet Class Reference

Class to do a Http GET request. Simple, because it does nothing more. Nonetheless, it supports timeout and proxy. More...

Detailed Description

Class to do a Http GET request. Simple, because it does nothing more. Nonetheless, it supports timeout and proxy.
